content: @Bryn Rhodes is there a way to make use of the cql-to-elm translator from the command line?

https://github.com/cqframework/clinical_quality_language/tree/master/Src/java#generate-an-elm-representation-of-cql-logic.
Is that what you're looking for?

Yeah that helps quite a bit. The instructions just weren't anywhere near the code that it uses.... I was looking for instructions here .. https://github.com/cqframework/clinical_quality_language/blob/master/Src/java/cql-to-elm/OVERVIEW.md
